text: Haven USD 312 is a public unified school district headquartered in Haven, Kansas, United States.USD 312 The district includes the communities of Darlow, Haven, Mount Hope, Partridge, Yoder, and nearby rural areas.USD 312 District Map; KSDOT. ==See also== * Kansas State Department of Education * Kansas State High School Activities Association * List of high schools in Kansas * List of unified school districts in Kansas ==References== ==External links== * Category:School districts in Kansas
title: Haven USD 312
